long_description: The Marmot ROM jacket wraps you in a high-perfomance soft shell that fends off wind and light moisture, and it's breathable for maximum comfort on your outdoor adventures. WINDSTOPPER(R) fabric helps eliminate windchill, yet it's breathable and quickly dissipates excess moisture to keep you dry and warm. Marmot ROM jacket balances weather resistance, breathability and warmth; it performs in a wide variety of aerobic activities in moderate weather. Soft-shell stretch is especially suited for comfort during active endeavors; venting side panels add breathability. Attached hood adjusts close to head for weather protection but doesn't obstruct peripheral vision. Drawcord hem and adjustable, asymmetric cuffs. Pack Pockets(TM) are easy to access and accommodate a backpack or climbing harness; jacket also features an outside chest pocket. Angel-Wing Movement(TM) sleeves allows unrestricted range of motion and prevent jacket from lifting when arms are raised. Closeout.
short_description: The Marmot ROM jacket wraps you in a high-perfomance soft shell that fends off wind and light moisture, and it's breathable for maximum comfort on your outdoor adventures.
